item.title: Open-sources and Apps
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: Gen AI Hands On Practices Google Colab Hands-on practice for developing Gen AI applications, and understanding the concepts. ☞ Github ☞ Learn More OpenThread Commissioner Implementation in Java OpenThread’s open-source project currently offers a native Commissioner CLI and an Android app for external commissioning, but no standalone Java-based implementation. This project aims to bridge that gap by providing a step-by-step guide for developers to build an external Commissioner in Java.
